channel.title: Entrepreneurship - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

image.title: Terry Chen
image.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: Built to last
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Competitive differentiation in the age of AI - observations on building sustainable advantages when technology commoditizes quickly.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: From Raw Social Data to Real Research
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Transform large-scale social conversations into actionable insights. Understand crowd sentiment, track emerging opinions, and identify key narratives.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: When to Sunset a Product: A Decision Framework for Entrepreneurs
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: A framework for deciding when to sunset products and projects. Understanding opportunity costs, sunk cost fallacy, and making difficult decisions about failing ventures. Essential guidance for startup founders and product managers.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Why People Care What Others Think
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Understanding collective intelligence and social dynamics. Why crowd psychology matters for product builders and how human need for belonging drives engagement patterns.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Product Engineers and AI Multipliers
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: How AI is transforming product engineering teams into smaller, more efficient units. Learn why product engineers are becoming more valuable than traditional product managers in AI-first organizations.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Interesting Reads
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Curated collection of compelling articles and insights on AI agents, entrepreneurship, and product development. Features analysis of breakthrough AI tools and emerging trends.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: User Needs & Opportunities
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Identifying real user pain points and business opportunities through conversations and online research. A collection of validated user needs that could become viable startups.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Essence of Creativity: Future of Creative Work
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Exploring the intersection of AI-generated content and human creativity. Analysis of creative workflows, multimodal interactions, and the future of content creation in the AI era.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Cogno: Multi-agent AI for Sales Automation
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description:
Multi-agent system for cross boarder e-commerce sales automation. Co-founder and head of product. https://cognogpt.com

Cogno+ is dedicated to revolutionizing global e-commerce by empowering brands with AI-driven assistance that offers seamless, personalized customer experiences. Our mission is to serve as the digital bridge between brands and customers, enhancing interactions and transactions across international markets, and allowing the brand to increase conversion and upsell while reducing time and money spent on manual customer service.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Multi-agent LLM Systems
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Developing capable multi-agent systems for complex reasoning and human-AI collaboration.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
